attributes.action: Stop the signs on the busses that say "There's probably no God. Now stop worrying and enjoy your life"
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The UK is meant to be a christian country (unless I'm completely wrong) yet they allow signs like "There's probably no God. Now stop worrying and enjoy your life." We dont people giving their point of view but surely as a christian nation this is overstepping the mark!!

rejection.details: This is a matter for Transport for London (TFL), who fall within the remit of the Mayor of London's office.
reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
